meanings.sent1: The practic exercises helped me improve my skills.
meanings.sent2: Regular practic sessions are essential for mastering any craft.
meanings.sent3: The practic approach to learning made the subject more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her practic mindset turned every challenge into an opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's practic guidance made a significant difference in my performance.

meanings.definition: Capable of being put into practice
meanings.sent1: His practic suggestions were easy to implement.
meanings.sent2: The new technique seemed practic and effective.
meanings.sent3: She found a practic solution to the problem in no time.
meanings.sent4: The plan was so practic that it was executed flawlessly.
meanings.sent5: The practic nature of the advice made it valuable for everyone.

meanings.definition: Engaged in actual work or practice
meanings.sent1: The practic team members were dedicated to their tasks.
meanings.sent2: Being practic professionals, they knew how to handle challenges.
meanings.sent3: The practic employees always delivered exceptional results.
meanings.sent4: His practic approach to the project impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The practic nature of their work ethic set a high standard for others.
